alert.note: Alert for Mobile; Washington (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 14 at 4:43PM CST until December 14 at 5:30PM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Mobile County in southwestern Alabama... Southwestern Washington County in southwestern Alabama... George County in southeastern Mississippi... Southeastern Perry County in southeastern Mississippi... Southern Greene County in southeastern Mississippi... Eastern Stone County in southeastern Mississippi... * Until 530 PM CST. * At 443 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 11 miles southwest of McLain to 4 miles east of Saucier, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lucedale, Leakesville and McLain. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CST for southwestern Alabama...and southeastern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CST for southwestern Alabama...and southeastern Mississippi.
